original_text: Simon and his friends were very surprised. They were all surprised because they had caught so many fish.
korean_text: 이는 자기 및 자기와 함께 있는 모든 사람이 고기 잡힌 것으로 말미암아 놀라고

sentences.original_text: Simon and his friends were very surprised.
because they had caught so many fish.
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그들이 너무 많은 물고기를 잡았기 때문입니다.
